channel.title: HELP ME - Cant log out for 20 seconds after trading
channel.description:
I want to make it like, after a trade, you can't log out for 20 seconds..
To stop duping, please if you know it, post a little ''tutorial'' as reply. :)!
It's delta base - 317 -

item.title: HELP ME - Cant log out for 20 seconds after trading
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:6, topic:271297”]Under -

public void savegame(boolean logout) {

No error but,

If I click on decline i auto disconnect

how i can fix that?

srry ;D

item.title: HELP ME - Cant log out for 20 seconds after trading
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:4, topic:271297”]Just do this -

if (logout && inTrade) { declineTrade(); }[/quote]

Tyvm, under what/where i add that?

Sorry, I’m kinda noob lol.

item.title: HELP ME - Cant log out for 20 seconds after trading
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:271297”]look for the ending msg like trade accepted

add something like
logouttimer = 40;

or watever u use to delay logout :)[/quote]

I got a error, I added it like this:

public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
           client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
	if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		other.sM("Other player has declined the

trade.");
other.declineTrade(false);
logouttimer = 40;
